title: this might sound stupid but hell with it
body: wheres a basketball draven skin like he throws basket balls at the enemy an his q he spins the basket balls on the tip of his finger it would be sick well i think so

replies.body:
Could make an entire dunk master team- 

* Darius
* Draven 
* Sion
* Morgana
* Katarina (I really wanted to say syndra, but she isn't Noxian)

> [{quoted}](name=Princess Yaia,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AWUrwOYZ,comment-id=0003,timestamp=2016-02-24T03:19:07.728+0000)

> Could make an entire dunk master team- 
> 
> * Darius
> * Draven 
> * Sion
> * Morgana
> * Katarina (I really wanted to say syndra, but she isn't Noxian)

Why the last 3?

The Dunkmaster skin came from Darius becoming the new "Dunkmaster" and replacing Master Yi, as well as his design being perfect for the skin.

it kinda is bs isn't it

> [{quoted}](name=Lord Kylar Alice,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AWUrwOYZ,comment-id=00030000,timestamp=2016-02-24T04:08:57.155+0000)
>
> Why the last 3?
> 
> The Dunkmaster skin came from Darius becoming the new "Dunkmaster" and replacing Master Yi, as well as his design being perfect for the skin.

Well, the existing skin is for Darius, the hand of *Noxus*
The thread is about making a basketball skin for Draven (also Noxian)
For a basketball team to be legit they kinda have to be from the same area, which means we can't randomly have syndra in the mix (even though it would be perf), so we have to go through the Noxian champs, and find the ones that could potentially have super cool related particles. 

Sion could be the coach, and like darius, could have a basketball post as a weapon.
Morgana qs could be basketballs and her pool could look like a court
Katrina would make an A+ cheerleader
